CustomField.description: Calculates the base unit price to be used in the quote documents.
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Apttus_QPConfig__BasePriceOverride__c) != null, Apttus_QPConfig__BasePriceOverride__c, IF(TEXT(CPQ_Agreement_Contract_Price__c) != null, CPQ_Agreement_Contract_Price__c, Apttus_QPConfig__ListPrice__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the base unit price to be used in in quote documents.
CustomField.label: DA Unit Price
